Red_Orchestra_2.name: Red Orchestra 2
Red_Orchestra_2.shortDescription: Multiplayer first-person shooter game. Responsible for programming core gameplay for the "Search and Destroy" game mode.
Red_Orchestra_2.description: Red Orchestra 2 is a realistic, World War 2 shooter created by Tripwire Interactive. I worked with a small development team of other programmers and artists to specifically create the "Search and Destroy" mode. "Search and-Destroy" is an objective-based game mode where an attacking team of players has to plant a timed bomb onto an objective while the defending team is required to guard that objective.

credits.name: Chris Hassebrook
credits.role: core gameplay programming including network replication
